email_subject: Quicker and easier shopping with Tesco.
email_body:
We know how important it is that shopping online is both quick and easy, that's why we've introduced a number of changes and improvements to make our site easier to use - and your life easier. Here's a quick guide:
- Special offers are easier to spot and access
- 'Search' has been improved to make finding what you want easier
- We've sped up the site to make shopping easier
- We've made it easier to tell your personal shopper what you want

Remember you earn Clubcard points on every purchase

If you would prefer not to receive emails with news and special offers from Tesco.ie, please click here: Unsubscribe. It may take up to five working days to unsubscribe.
